details: This course covers the basics of computer science, including programming, algorithms, and data structures.
An in-depth course on advanced mathematical concepts such as calculus, linear algebra, and differential equations.
Learn the principles of business management, including leadership, strategy, and organizational behavior.
A comprehensive course on graphic design, covering topics such as typography, color theory, and digital illustration.
Explore the fundamentals of psychology, including cognitive, behavioral, and social psychology.
An introductory course on marketing, covering topics such as market research, consumer behavior, and advertising.
Study the science of the environment, including ecosystems, climate change, and conservation strategies.
Develop your writing skills in this course focused on creative writing, including fiction, poetry, and creative non-fiction.
Discover the history of art from ancient times to the modern era, including key movements and influential artists.
